title: Smiteless jungle is actually a thing and you are new if you don't know about it.
body:
Contrary to popular belief by a sea of know it all cookie cutter players who might deny this claim. 

Smiteless jungle is indeed a thing you should respect.

I know because I am the World's best Fiora and there was a time before riot reworked my champ to be a jerk that I was the World's best player.

I could of beat any LCS champ in the World.

And yes...

I was a smiteless jungler.

Let me explain how they play differently from a regular jungler.

It's something that requires a team of 5 at spawn.

You all 5 invade giving the smiteless red buff and a kill or two.

Then the smiteless does what every cookie cutter player hates...

They opt to either do more ganks and just continue chasing enemy champions all game

OR

They opt to continue jungling...

OR

They lane with you.  When a smiteless jungle lanes with a mid laner they freak out.
However it is something they should accept instead of going afk and bitching at you they should actually poke and help get 1st blood.

________________________________________________________________________________

It's not a debate...
I was the World's best.  You help the smiteless jungle till lane till 3 or 6 so they can jungle on their own.

Let's be frank.

Smite is bad.
Smite weapons are also bad.

Flash and Ignight only.

replies.body: Can't tell if troll, or if head so far up own ass that not even light or time can escape the void it's entered in to.
Look at his other posts. I think he requires mental help.
Let me help, Its a troll. Look at their match history and check the death maps.
Here, Have some attention and down votes. You seem to be in dire need of both.
When are you doing your AMA on reddit?

At last I see the light 

Thank you
Lol, just because something exists does not make it good...
-20 down votes are new players who hate different new ideas...
